card.name: SW - TU Consumer Profile Prescribed Purpose

data.text:
@gillianoberholzer @shaunviljoen please can you ask TU to provide us with a list of Prescribed Purposes since I am sending them an ID of "35" and it registers differently on their side. They might have changed the wording recently.

This is the service URL: https://secure.transunion.co.za/TUBureau116/Consumer.asmx
